reqs:
Non-CELL Grad Program students should register in CELL 504 01W. This class will take place in LSC 3.310.
Non-CELL Graduate Program students should register in this section if they wish to take this course.
courseName: Current Topics in Cytoskeleton and Cell Motility
description: Structure and function of the cytoskeleton, and its involvement in various forms of cell and intracellular motility.
